title: Polki Kundan Studs - Traditional Bottu Design
materials: Rose-cut Polki center stone. Crafted with the signature Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: Features a traditional Bottu (dot) design, with a central triangle Polki diamond surrounded by smaller round Polkis. The Polki diamonds are meticulously set in a closed setting showcasing the natural beauty of the uncut stones. The gold plating is designed to resemble an antique finish, adding a vintage charm.
colors: Predominantly gold with the translucent shimmer of the Polki diamonds.
occasions: or as a subtle statement piece for special occasions. Also suitable for traditional events like haldi ceremonies
or as a sophisticated addition to your office attire.
description: These earrings are a testament to timeless South Indian craftsmanship. The use of Polki diamonds offers a unique sparkle, while the Bottu design carries cultural significance. The high-quality gold plating ensures durability and a lasting sheen. A versatile piece that blends tradition with contemporary style.
